title: TIFT - THE FESTIVAL OF DYONYSOS - UNDERWORLDS (2025)
type: A site specific audio reactive sound installation.
description:
The Listening Field
Speak, whisper, shout.
The space hears you, distorts you, and answers back.

Voices drift and return changed.
No memory. Only echoes.

Pass through. Follow the sound. Take a seat.
Stay as long as you like. The room is listening.
technical: Two Daisy Seed microcontrollers record audio through MAX9814 capsules posititioned on different walls. Room sound is captured, transformed, and sent through several audio paths that oscillate over a set period of time. A digital polyphonic synthesizer is programmed to generate chords every few seconds while shifting between specific melodic modes every few minutes. The installation occupied two vacant office rooms, one serving as a transitional space, and the other as the main interactive sound environment.

title: BANFF CENTRE (2024)
description: Virtual installation adapted from a generative system at The Banff Centre. Built from recordings made with binaural mics, cyclical processing and multi-channel playback.
